data.name: CreateControlTable
ReadControlTable1
data.value: select top(1) CNTL_TBL_ID, LAST_USED_NUMBER from CKT_CONTROL_TABLE where CNTL_TBL_ID = 'HINS POLICY TERMED FILE DATE'

data.name: ReadControlTable2
data.value: select top(1) CNTL_TBL_ID, LAST_USED_NUMBER from CKT_CONTROL_TABLE where CNTL_TBL_ID = 'HINS POLICY TERMED FILE DATE'

data.name: UpdateControlTable
data.value: update CKT_CONTROL_TABLE set LAST_USED_NUMBER = @lastUsedNumber where CNTL_TBL_ID = @cntlTblId
